lead_paragraph: A court-ordered DNA test shows a man who has long claimed to be the father of the late boxing champ Johnny Tapia is not his dad after all, in the latest saga involving the troubled boxer after his death.
snippet: A court-ordered DNA test shows a man who has long claimed to be the father of the late boxing champ Johnny Tapia is not his dad after all, in the latest saga involving the troubled boxer after his death....

headline.main: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head
headline.print_headline: Poland Wants Center-Right MEP to Replace Tusk as European Council Head
